```{r readWines}
readURL <- function(inputURL)  #Begin function named readStates that takes a URL
{
  csvFile <- read.csv(url(inputURL))  #assign the results of the URL call as a csv file to a dataframe named csvFile
  return(csvFile)  # return the dataframe
}

redWine <- readURL("https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/wine-quality/winequality-red.csv")
whiteWine <- readURL("https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/wine-quality/winequality-white.csv")

str(redWine)
str(whiteWine)
summary(redWine)
summary(whiteWine)

```
